name: Lets Go Build A ______________
description:
A new thing to build everyday, but only 20 bricks to make it.

Take a screenshot and then share it with #LetsGoBuildA

  • Press Space or Right Click to rotate a brick you are holding.
  • Press 'R' to reset the game.
  • Click on the arrows to select from more brick types.

Coverage & Mentions:

Rock Paper Shotgun: https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2020/04/08/challenge-yourself-to-a-tiny-lego-build-every-day-in-this-browser-game/
